item.title: Repo: Hibiscus
item.description: Hibiscus Repositories How to set up https://bmhm.github.io/repositories/hibiscus Plugins hibiscus.ffb.depot (Github) Plugin, which uses the ffb.depot.client library to implement FFB Balance. See below for library details. Libraries ffb.depot.client (Github) Jax-RS 2.0 Library, which can authenticate a user and parses data from the fidelity.de page to access ones funds depot. slf4j-jameica (Github) slf4j-bridge. If installed, java libraries which depend on slf4j will log to jameicas logging facility (org.willuhn.logging.Logger).
